data.description: Interface to the Mozilla embedding widget
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Gtk2::MozEmbed is a thin wrapper around the Mozilla GTK+ embedding
    widget. This namespace was chosen mainly because the underlying
    library is usually referred to as mozilla-gtkmozembed and because
    the main C object used is called GtkMozEmbed.

    Gtk2::MozEmbed also uses the whole gtk2-perl tool chain, including
    Glib, Gtk2, ExtUtils::Depends, and ExtUtils::PkgConfig.
